name: FROSTBITE: Deadly Climate
description: Survive the arctic research base simply known as Base 75, or die from the freezing cold or by the horrors that lurk within the halls?
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 or later (64-Bit) Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad CPU Q6600 @ 2.40GHz (4 CPUs) or later Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GT 740 or later DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 600 MB available space Sound Card: Stereo
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
